name: Insect Shooter (d.prokopchuk)
description:
This is my 3D FPS project.

Modifications:

  1. Created three complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent levels.
  2. Added multiple additional levels and tied them in to create a logical progression in game. 
  3. Modified the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way.
  4. Modified the in-game GUI in significant way: changed the health bar style, textures and colors, changed the weapon selection display, changed lives icon, changed ui backdrops and buttons.
  5. Changed weapon models and changed their colors and materials.
  6. Replaced the ammo pickups with the appropriate weapon models(and added the pickup animation script to them).
  7. Added custom music to my game. I created 4 different melodies (menu theme and melody for each level) in FL studio.
  8. Changed the skybox.

Credits:

Created by Dmytro Prokopchuk
